Summary: Three separated lights moving in different ways then stopped completely.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ezpeleta
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was coming from the kitchen and spotted rain clouds that were disipating, and realiced there was a bright light moving in the oposite direction of the clouds. then i took a reference with the walls, cause i thought that maybe i was imagining the movement, after the clouds were gone the object continue moving along with another 2 moving in different directions. this is something that just happened, i told my mom, she saw the same thing and also realiced that one of them might be a satellite or someting like that, but then when it stopped and remained in the same spot for several minutes we figured that was another thing. the colour was white, red, blue and changing. i realiced that the nearest and brighter one had a sort of light below it...but they still looked like stars to me. then the rain clouds came back and could see them anymore now i`m waiting for the clouds to clear the sky and allow me to see if those "stars" still there... anyway i had to say this cause was really strange indeed... saludos desde argentina (greeting from argentina) *wit's name deleted--sgonzalez\cms.
